code: import React from"react";import"./Course.css";import coinactiveIcon from'./assets/icons/coin-active.png';import doneIcon from'./assets/icons/done.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Course=_ref=>{let{id,title,pic,description,coinactive,completion,status}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pic-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:pic,alt:"course Pic",className:"course-pic"}),status===1?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"coin-active",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:coinactiveIcon,alt:"CoinActive Icon",className:"coinactive-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[coinactive," \u0111i\u1EC3m"]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"done",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:doneIcon,alt:"Done Icon",className:"done-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\u0110\xE3 ho\xE0n th\xE0nh"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"status-line",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"status-background"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"status-progress",style:{width:"".concat(completion,"%")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"status-text",style:{left:"".concat(completion,"%"),top:'-25px'},children:[completion,"%"]})," "]})]})]});};export default Course;
